```{r}
#load the dataframe containing the NDVI data and the covariates 
data <- read_csv("~//Documents//Analysis//output_data//forests_pixel_ndvi_temp_precip_hm_time_series.csv")

#unique names in area_name column
unique_names_all <- unique(data$area_name)
print(unique_names_all)
#Get a sample of the first 5 columns 
head(data)

#Subset data from the gardenroute and create a new dataframe 
Garden_Route_data <- subset(data, grepl("garden route", area_name, ignore.case = TRUE))


# You can now view the new, subsetted data frame
head(Garden_Route_data)
# Save the subsetted data to a CSV file
write.csv(Garden_Route_data, "Garden_Route_data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
# Check csv file 
check_data <- read.csv("Garden_Route_data.csv")

#Create a second dataframe of another reserve 
Mphaphuli_Protected_data <- subset(data, grepl("Mphaphuli Protected", area_name, ignore.case = TRUE))

# You can now view the new, subsetted data frame
head(Mphaphuli_Protected_data)
# Save the subsetted data to a CSV file
write.csv(Mphaphuli_Protected_data, "Mphaphuli_Protected_data.csv", row.names = FALSE)

 #Check csv file 
check_data <- read.csv("Mphaphuli_Protected_data.csv")
```
